outputs.name: interior_set
outputs.description:
A list of interior modifiers that can be used to edit
or create a ModifierSet object.

inputs.name: _interior_wall_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for interior walls (or text for
the identifier of the modifier within the library).

inputs.name: _ceiling_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for ceilings (or text for the identifier of
the modifier within the library).

inputs.name: _interior_floor_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for interior floors (or text for
the identifier of the modifier within the library).

inputs.name: _interior_window_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for all apertures with a Surface
boundary condition. This can also be text for the identifier of the
modifier within the library.

inputs.name: _interior_door_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for all opaque doors with a Surface
boundary condition. This can also be text for the identifier of the
modifier within the library.

inputs.name: _int_glass_door_
inputs.description:
A modifier object for all glass doors with a Surface
boundary condition. This can also be text for the identifier of the
modifier within the library.

name: HB Interior Modifier Subset
description:
Create a list of interior modifiers that can be used to edit or create a
ModifierSet object.
-
